body.p: In the light of this feedback the IASB considered in its redeliberations:

li.p: whether the time value of an option should always be expensed over the life of the option instead of applying the accounting as proposed in the 2010 Hedge Accounting Exposure Draft;
whether it should remove the differentiation between transaction related and time-period related hedged items and replace it with a single accounting treatment; and
whether it should simplify the requirement to account for the fair value of the aligned time value.
